headline.main: CHILE PICKS WOMAN TO AID LABOR TALKS; Senorita Mandujano Advised Here of Appointment

lead_paragraph: Word was received yesterday by Senorita Graciela Mandujano, Chilean Department of Agriculture official, that she had been appointed technical adviser to the Chilean delegation to the International Labor Office conference, scheduled to open here next Monday.
abstract: G Mandujano on Rural Educ Inst work

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: WAR, CAUSE AND CURE OF, NATL COM ON THE
